ygData.msgSnippet: I found this in pkgsrc-wip the other day, and wondered why I hadn t heard of it yet: http://www.hping.org/wbox/ I ve found it quite useful already, thought it

I found this in pkgsrc-wip the other day, and wondered why I hadn't 
heard of it yet: 

http://www.hping.org/wbox/ 

I've found it quite useful already, thought it deserved a mention 
here. Enjoy! 

-Eric
